Title: Legalizes adult possession and use of certain natural plant or fungus-based hallucinogens
Summary: Legalizes adult possession and use of certain natural plant or fungus-based hallucinogens; grants certain protections for individuals lawfully using such hallucinogens; removes such hallucinogens from the list of schedule I controlled substances; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 223 §§223.00 - 223.15, amd §220.00, Pen L; amd §3306, Pub Health L; amd §201-d, Lab L; amd §114-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the public health law, the labor law, and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to legalizing adult possession and use of certain natural plant or fungus-based hallucinogens
